```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(alcyon)
```

```{r}
galleryMap <- st_read(
  system.file(
    "extdata", "testdata", "gallery",
    "gallery_lines.mif",
    package = "alcyon"
  ),
  geometry_column = 1L, quiet = TRUE
)
```

```{r}
pointMap <- makeVGAPointMap(galleryMap,
  fillX = 3.01,
  fillY = 6.7,
  gridSize = 0.04
)
vgaMap <- pointMapToSf(pointMap)$map
plot(vgaMap["Connectivity"])
```

```{r}
vgaMetric(pointMap, -1, FALSE)
vgaMap <- pointMapToSf(pointMap)$map
plot(vgaMap["Metric.Mean.Shortest.Path.Distance"])
```

```{r}
vgaThroughVision(pointMap)
vgaMap <- pointMapToSf(pointMap)$map
plot(vgaMap["Through.vision"])
```

```{r}
vgaAngular(pointMap, -1, FALSE)
vgaMap <- pointMapToSf(pointMap)$map
plot(vgaMap["Angular.Mean.Depth"])
```

```{r}
vgaVisualGlobal(pointMap, -1, FALSE)
vgaMap <- pointMapToSf(pointMap)$map
plot(vgaMap["Visual.Integration..HH."])
```

```{r}
vgaVisualLocal(pointMap, FALSE)
vgaMap <- pointMapToSf(pointMap)$map
plot(vgaMap["Visual.Clustering.Coefficient"])
```

```{r}
boundaryMap <- sfToShapeMap(galleryMap)
vgaIsovist(pointMap, boundaryMap)
vgaMap <- pointMapToSf(pointMap)$map
plot(vgaMap["Isovist.Area"])
```
